main event: An unidentified aerial object, possibly a high altitude balloon, was observed hovering over Pepperrell Air Force Base in Newfoundland on June 21, 1953.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 22 minutes,The object hovered at an estimated altitude of 40,000 feet,The object did not engage in any maneuvers during the sighting,Initial evaluation concluded the object was a balloon,The weather conditions were clear and suitable for visibility.
witness description: Ground observers, including a military officer.
